appDesc.message: Chat with multiple GPTs simultaneously. Supports ChatGPT, Claude, DeepSeek, Grok, Gemini, and more!

siteCheckTips.message: Please select the stations to display simultaneously.

siteCheckNote.message:
Note: Make sure your network can access the official website before use. Logging in will enhance the plugin's performance.
⚠️Opening too many pages at the same time will consume a lot of memory. Please try to keep it within 6.
As the website is frequently updated, please ensure the plugin is kept up to the latest version.
